# [Interview #1121: Brandon Sanderson Book Signing at JordanCon 8, Entry #19](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1121#19)

#### Question

Has Wax seen the influence of Shard other than Preservation, Ruin and Harmony?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yes. He has seen the influence of another Shard.

#### Question

Might that Shard be Autonomy?

#### Brandon Sanderson

It might.
